thread.title: Well worth a visit
thread.title_full: Well worth a visit - Review of Eight Restaurant, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: woodieslocksheath
title: Well worth a visit
text:
We dropped in for an impromptu visit and inquired if there was a table for two and the management were very accommodating and rustled up one for us....we were delighted too!
This restaurant, part of the Spier Wine Farm/Hotel, is a really super place to eat with a wide choice of high quality food served in very pleasant surroundings - with an "eco" emphasis - by attentive staff.
We had two mains, two desserts, a bottle of Sauvignon Blanc plus water & a soft drink for 606 Rand (excluding service/tips) which we thought was very good VFM.
